props.name: activationMode
props.description: The activation event of the editable field

props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: autoResize
props.description: Whether the editable field should auto resize

props.name: color
props.description: Overrides the accent color inherited from the theme.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value of the editable field

props.name: dir
props.description: The reading direction of the calendar when applicable. <br> If omitted, inherits globally from ConfigProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the editable field is disabled

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the field

props.name: maxLength
props.description: The maximum number of characters allowed

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The value of the editable field

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: The placeholder for the editable field

props.name: radius
props.description: Overrides the radius inherited from the theme.

props.name: readonly
props.description: Whether the editable field is read-only

props.name: required
props.description: When true, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.

props.name: selectOnFocus
props.description: Whether to select the text in the input when it is focused.

props.name: size
props.description: Control the size of the padding and radius.

props.name: startWithEditMode
props.description: Whether to start with the edit mode active

props.name: submitMode
props.description: The submit event of the editable field
